Question: Flitway CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Flitway

CES 2024

- Flitway will showcase their latest electric aircraft at CES 2024
- The electric aircraft will feature a range of up to 400 miles
- It will be capable of carrying up to six passengers
- The aircraft will incorporate advanced safety and navigation systems
- Flitway's electric aircraft will offer a luxurious and comfortable cabin environment
Summary_cn:
电冲航空公司将在2024年的国际消费电子展上展示他们最新的电动飞机。
这款电动飞机的续航里程可达400英里。
它可容纳最多六名乘客。
该飞机将采用先进的安全和导航系统。
电冲航空的电动飞机将提供豪华舒适的客舱环境。
